text: The Pallisers is a British TV show. It is an adaption of the novels by Anthony Trollope and aired on BBC2 from 19 January to 21 November, 1974 for 26 episodes. It is set the 19th century. ==Other websites== *BBC programme * Category:1974 television series debuts Category:1974 television series endings Category:1970s British drama television series Category:1974 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1970s British television series endings
title: The Pallisers
